name: Mother 3
overview: The Nowhere Islands are an idyllic place; the residents of Tazmily Village live peacefully and in harmony with nature and with each other. But this all changes when the mysterious Pigmask Army arrives and proceeds to destroy and corrupt, with force and sly persuasion alike. Lucas and his friends must find out who wants to destroy the tranquility of Nowhere Islands and turn them into a high-tech nightmare.
